invention-title: Method for realizing wide-load soft combustion of hydrogen fuel
一种实现氢燃料宽负荷柔和燃烧方法

abstract.p: According to the method and device for achieving wide-load soft combustion of the hydrogen fuel, high-temperature fuel gas generated through catalytic combustion serves as jet flow fuel gas of the soft combustion chamber, the temperature of reactants in the soft combustion chamber is increased, dependence of soft combustion on backflow smoke is reduced, the stable operation interval of soft combustion is expanded, and the purpose of achieving wide-load soft combustion of the hydrogen fuel is achieved. And wide-load soft combustion of hydrogen fuel is realized. Hydrogen is a carbon-free energy carrier and is an important fuel for realizing decarburization and emission reduction in the gas turbine industry, however, the hydrogen has the characteristics of high adiabatic flame temperature, dominant diffusion and the like, so that the problems of high NOx emission, easy thermo-acoustic oscillation, easy tempering and the like are generated when the hydrogen is used as the fuel of the gas turbine. Low NOx emission of hydrogen fuel can be achieved through soft combustion, the problems of thermo-acoustic oscillation, tempering and the like are solved, but the performance is seriously deteriorated under the variable load condition, and the requirement of a wide-load gas turbine cannot be met. The variable working condition performance of soft combustion is improved through catalytic combustion, high-efficiency and low-NOx emission combustion of hydrogen fuel under the wide load condition is achieved, and the problems that in hydrogen combustion, NOx emission is high, thermo-acoustic oscillation is likely to happen, and tempering is likely to happen are effectively solved.

本发明提供了一种实现氢燃料宽负荷柔和燃烧方法及装置，以催化燃烧生成的高温燃气作为柔和燃烧室的射流燃气，提高柔和燃烧室内反应物的温度，降低柔和燃烧对回流烟气的依赖，扩展柔和燃烧的稳定运行区间，实现氢燃料的宽负荷柔和燃烧。氢是一种无碳能源载体，是燃气轮机行业实现脱碳减排的重要燃料，然而，氢具有绝热火焰温度高和优势扩散等特性，导致以氢为燃气轮机燃料时，产生NOx排放高、易热声振荡和易回火等问题。柔和燃烧可实现氢燃料的低NOx排放，解决热声振荡和回火等问题，但变负荷条件下性能恶化严重，无法满足宽负荷燃气轮机需求。本发明通过催化燃烧改善柔和燃烧的变工况性能，实现宽负荷条件下氢燃料的高效率和低NOx排放燃烧，有效解决了氢燃烧中的NOx排放高、易热声振荡和易回火等问题。
